entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -43.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -43.4°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -47.6°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 45 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 45 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
